options.name: Parsnip Soup
options.description: With chestnut, pear, parsley & white truffle oil, served with gluten free toast

options.name: Smoked Salmon Tartare
options.description: On marinated beetroot, with citrus crème fraîche & dill, served with gluten free toast

options.name: Duck Rillettes
options.description: Shredded, slow-cooked duck with wholegrain mustard, rosemary, cornichons & pickled shallots, served with gluten free toast

options.name: Pear & Bayonne Ham Salad
options.description: With golden beetroot & watercress, drizzled with Roquefort dressing & served with gluten free toast

options.name: Prawn Thermidor
options.description: King prawns cooked in a lobster mornay sauce with Comté cheese, an apple & herb garnish & gluten free toast

options.name: Sea Bream Grenobloise
options.description: Served with a brown butter, lemon, caper & parsley sauce, creamed potatoes, braised fennel & cherry tomatoes

options.name: Turkey Paupiette
options.description: British turkey breast with pork & apricot stuffing wrapped in streaky bacon. Served with sage & onion duchois, braised red cabbage, French beans, Tenderstem broccoli, Chantenay carrots & cranberry jus

options.name: Roasted Butternut Squash
options.description: On a bed of braised lentils in a tomato Provençale sauce, harissa & coconut yoghurt

options.name: Sirloin (8 oz)
options.description: Cut, trimmed and prepared in the Coté butchery. Served with frites & watercress. Recommended medium rare (+£3.5 supplement)

options.name: Winter Spiced Crème Brûlée
options.description: Burnt vanilla custard infused with star anise, cinnamon, ginger & nutmeg, topped with poached clementines & redcurrants

options.name: Cheese Board
options.description: Morbier, Fourme d'Ambert, Truffled Brie & Tomme de Savoie, red onion jam, fig, grapes & gluten free toast
